description.zh: TavernAI 是一个专为聊天和故事创作设计的沉浸式前端界面。它支持多种AI后端，为用户提供灵活且富有沉浸感的交互体验。该平台强调个性化设置、用户互动以及与多种文本生成模型的无缝集成。
description.en: TavernAI is an atmospheric frontend interface designed for chat and storywriting experiences. It supports a wide range of AI backends, offering users a flexible and immersive environment. The platform emphasizes customization, user interaction, and seamless integration with various text generation models.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供视觉沉浸感强且可定制的界面，增强故事创作与聊天体验
- 支持多种AI后端，部署方式灵活多样
- 提供在线版和本地下载版本，跨平台可用性高

## 功能列表:

- 角色创建
- 在线角色数据库
- 支持多角色同时参与的群聊
- 故事模式
- 世界信息设定
- 消息滑动切换
- 可配置的文本生成设置
- 可自定义界面主题（包括类似CharacterAI的风格）
- 可配置背景（提供多种美观默认选项）
- 编辑、删除和移动任意消息
- 支持GPT和Claude的图像识别功能
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers a visually immersive and customizable interface for enhanced storytelling and chatting
- Supports a wide variety of AI backends for flexible deployment options
- Provides cross-platform availability with both online and downloadable versions

## Features:

- Character creation
- Online character database
- Group chat with multiple characters at the same time
- Story mode
- World info
- Message swiping
- Configurable generation settings
- Configurable interface themes, including one that resembles CharacterAI
- Configurable backgrounds, including beautiful defaults to select from
- Edit, delete, and move any message
- GPT and Claude picture recognition
